channel.title: NOOB - Simple fix need help
channel.description:
My run.bat is not working and i don't know why. I put in the right directory for my Java and I get this error message, then a split second later it closes: [code]The system cannot find the path specified.[/code]
When i edit the run.bat it says this [code]@Echo off Cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_67\bin\Javaw.exe" -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/code]

item.title: NOOB - Simple fix need help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

What it’s saying is
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_67\bin\Javaw.exe
is not ACTUALLY where the javaw file is located. It may simply be javaw instead of Javaw

Read full topic

item.title: NOOB - Simple fix need help
item.dc:creator: @Basix Basix
item.description:
@Basix wrote:

My run.bat is not working and i don’t know why. I put in the right directory for my Java and I get this error message, then a split second later it closes:

When i edit the run.bat it says this

@Echo off Cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_67\bin\Javaw.exe" -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit
